location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussorah [Basra], to Nawab Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 24 January 1802, Samuel Manesty, Resident at Bussora [Basra], acknowledges the receipt of a letter, dated 25 December 1801, from Nawab Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], and informs the Resident that in future he will communicate with him in English. Manesty goes on to write that the Recoverynow proceeds to Bushire, on her way to Muscat and Bombay. He states that he has limited the ship's stay at Bushire to twenty-four hours.
